pageContext.claim: “The Fake News Media hardly even discussed the tens of thousands of people that came to D.C. Formed organically, and in many parts of the Country! ”
pageContext.analysis: There was extensive news coverage of the pro-Trump rally. Whether the crowd actually numbered "tens of thousands" is open to dispute. The Washington Post, Fox News, The Associated Press, the BBC and NBC News estimated a crowd of “thousands” while Reuters and USA Today said "tens of thousands." Interestingly, Trump was more conservative in his estimate than House Press Secretary Kayleigh McEnany, who claimed a ridiculous number of over one million.
